case_title: TARIQ BAIG, MANAGING DIRECTOR, TARIQ GLASS INDUSTRIES LTD. vs EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR (SM), SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION OF PAKISTAN, ISLAMABAD
court_name: Appellate Bench of Securities and Exchange Commission of Pakistan
appellant: Tariq Baig, Managing Director, Tariq Glass Industries Ltd.
respondent: Executive Director (SM), Securities and Exchange Commission of Pakistan, Islamabad

appeal_challenges: Good faith in acquisition of shares
Exemption under proviso to subsection (1) of Section 224

claims: Shares acquired in satisfaction of debt previously contracted
Profit tendered to the company as interest-free loan
appellant.legal_basis: Proviso to subsection (1) of Section 224 of the Companies Ordinance, 1984

claims: Transaction executed within six months, attracting Section 224
Buy-back agreement does not constitute a debt agreement

decision.main_issue: Applicability of Section 224 and good faith in acquisition of shares
findings: Purchase not in satisfaction of debt previously contracted
Profit not lawfully tendered to the company
